name: Flying School bus Simulator game
description:
Flying School Bus simulator

Are you ready for an entertaining adventure?
Hey there Flying School Bus simulator! We offer you the chance to be the best schoolbus of the city!
Welcome to biggest open world Flying car Simulator. In this crazy game you will be flying with an bus. this might seem strange, but this game is really a lot of fun and challenge. Everything including physics are created to be as realistic as a real flying bus as possible.

Explore the beautiful open world with big cities and amazing wild nature terrains.
Thanks to modern games that look cool even on mobile phones, now we can better understand how it would look in real life.
Flying Car Battle is 3D Battle game with fast flying cars simulation. It is a unique 3D BUS shooter with a creative physical puzzle.
Start the engine and go up into the sky. Good graphics help you even more to smile watching how to fly this old veteran coaches like modern combat fighter.
The summer holidays are finally over and you’re preparing to get back to work. The kids are waiting for their favorite bus driver to transport them.

This game is perfect for you! You can test your airplane pilot skills and bus driving ability at the same time.
Fly your plane around the world discover new landscapes, Drive your muscle car do stunts and drifts ! burn the asphalt road ! be the best car driver!
Flying School Bus simulator 3D is made for all fans of free car driving games, Simulation games and Airplane Flight games.

Graphics is wonderful interiors will make you feel like driving a real bus!
Fly around the world travel beautiful landscapes be a real bus driver.You are free in a world that you can do what you want.
Install now and feel the best airplane flight experience!A lot of really cool features opportunities are waiting for you. Have Fun.

Key Features:

=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Beautiful Landscapes
=> Easy and Free to use
=> Beautiful Mountains
=> No WiFi? No Problem.
=> Offline Play
